prog: (Python)# requires python 3.2 or higher. Otherwise use def'n of accumulate in python docs.from itertools import accumulateA011967_list, blist, b = [4], [5, 7, 10, 15], 15for _ in range(250):....blist = list(accumulate([b]+blist))....b = blist[-1]....A011967_list.append(blist[-5]) # _Chai Wah Wu_, Sep 20 2014
